author: vsiveton
msg: o forced the use of plexus-utils:1.4.3 to prevent org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.XmlReader not found

author: robbinspg
msg: Move location of core SCA schema to cpp/sca/runtime/core

author: gvanmatre
msg: Shale view library was not working with ajax4jsf.  Request parameters were being unnecessarily removed in order to ensure the destroy callback was invoked on ViewControllers annotated using the tiger library.  This logic was repositioned so that only ViewControllers are removed from the request map (SHALE-409).

author: chirino
msg: Better file locking on windows.  We now use a seperate lock file to signifiy the lock on the kaha db.

author: dennisl
msg: [MONE-16] Convert the reports to reporting plugins

o Added a mechanism to lookup the groupId of a report. Previously, if a report was only listed in the <reports> section of a model v3 pom, we had no idea which groupId it had. This means that we can now handle reports that do not come from the Maven project.
